meanings.definition: A collection of sounds or images that have been preserved for future reference.
meanings.sent1: I love listening to old recordings of my favorite songs.
meanings.sent2: The library has a vast collection of historical recordings.
meanings.sent3: My cat knocked over the box of recordings, and now they're all mixed up!
meanings.sent4: Her memories were like recordings playing in her mind, never fading.
meanings.sent5: The recordings of the birds chirping in the morning made the forest come alive.

meanings.definition: The act of capturing or preserving sounds or images for future reference.
meanings.sent1: The recordings of the concert turned out really well.
meanings.sent2: She always carries her camera for recordings of special moments.
meanings.sent3: I accidentally hit record on my phone, and now I have a recording of my pocket!
meanings.sent4: His laughter echoed through the room, a recording of pure joy.
meanings.sent5: The recording of the thunderstorm captured the power of nature in a single moment.
